ticket.title: Put ActionDispatch::Routing::RouteSet::Generator#use_relative_path! to work with absolute controller path
ticket.original-body:
My Rails3 app is raising "No route matches" errors when it try to generate urls from deepest controllers (like app/controller/lojista/citroen/de_france_controller linking to app/controller/atendimento_online_controller).
Reading the source I find RouteSet::Generator#use_relative_path! doesn't handle absolute controller path well.
Attached the patch to code and test suite.
